'''Swift Slayer''' is a basic daily [[commission]] in [[Inazuma]].

==Steps==
{{Quest Description|A band of rogues have appeared out in the wild, threatening the safety of the surrounding area. Head over there and take them out.}}
#Complete Time Trial Challenge 0/1

==Rewards==
{{Commission Rewards|full}}

==Enemies==
===Narukami Island===
(On the shore east of [[Chinju Forest]])

Defeat 1 enemy in 4:00: {{Enemy|Kairagi: Dancing Thunder|x=1}}.
*After every 20 seconds, a [[Chaos Cluster]] will spawn.
----
<!--(On the shore north of [[Chinju Forest]]) ??-->
(On the shore north of [[Konda Village]])

Defeat the {{Enemy|Thunderhelm Lawachurl}} within 240 seconds.
*The Lawachurl has a leader-[[attendant]] [[aura]].
*Two optional {{Enemy|Electro Samachurl|text=Electro Samachurls}} will spawn.

----
(Near a river north of [[Konda Village]] inland)

Defeat all opponents within 240 seconds.

*{{Enemy|Pyro Abyss Mage|x=1}}
*{{Enemy|Electro Abyss Mage|x=1}}

Initially, both abyss mages have a green aura indicating that they will heal after dropping to low health.
After dropping to low health (under ~15% remaining), the mage will gain another green aura spiraling around it; 6 seconds later, it will restore ~50% of its own health.
This ability can trigger once for each abyss mage; afterwards, the green auras will disappear.
----
(Near [[Perpetual Mechanical Array]])

Defeat the {{Enemy|Fatui Electro Cicin Mage|x=1}} within 240 seconds.
* The Electro Cicin Mage has the green leader-[[attendant]] [[aura]] and is enhanced.
* Its attendants are {{Enemy|Treasure Hoarders: Marksman|x=2}}

===Kannazuka===
(West part of Tatarasuna)

Defeat the Agent within 240 seconds.

*There will be a {{Enemy|Fatui Pyro Agent|x=1}} with a green leader-[[attendant]] [[aura]] and that is enhanced.
*Its attendants are an {{Enemy|Fatui Skirmisher - Anemoboxer Vanguard|x=1}} and an {{Enemy|Fatui Skirmisher - Electrohammer Vanguard|x=1}}
